pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, January 17, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Sherbrooke, Quebec

8:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Premier of Quebec François Legault.

Rivière St-François Room, Second Floor
Delta Sherbrooke
2685, rue King Ouest

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:15 a.m.

9:20 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Closed to media.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Cabinet Retreat family photo.

Sherbrooke C Room
Delta Sherbrooke
2685, rue King Ouest

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.

7:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a Cabinet Retreat working dinner.

Closed to media.
